3.86.text: So today I'm talking about books.

7.24.text: I've gone from being somebody that cannot read to being obsessed with reading.

11.52.text: Right now I am reading four books on the go.

16.48.text: I don't know how I am doing this

17.40.text: and there was a moment earlier when I had to stop myself

20.58.text: I had to say to myself "No!"

22.34.text: "Control yourself! Finish what you've already started."

26.26.text: So what am I reading, what am I getting obsessed with?

30.88.text: I am 150 pages in, and I love it.

34.14.text: As soon as I finish this I am going to review this in depth.

37.28.text: A video is on the way.

38.94.text: It is so good this, promise me you'll read this.

42.30.text: Book No. 2, I actually started this afternoon.

44.98.text: 'The Infinite Sea', which is the sequel to 'The 5th Wave' (Rick Yancey)

48.64.text: I must admit, I am 40 pages in and I'm struggling a little bit.

51.88.text: I'm just hoping that it's just because I am so preoccupied

54.92.text: with so much stuff right now, that it's distracting me from the

60.10.text: I am going to continue reading this, I want to know what happens.

63.50.text: Especially after I saw the first film today!

66.38.text: The film is a good adaptation of the book

68.28.text: the first half made me SO nervous.

70.78.text: It's one of those films that has such a

74.94.text: There was a little bit too much romance.

77.46.text: There was a few things I wasn't too happy with, but

81.30.text: And the music and sound design was perfect.

84.52.text: There is nothing like good sound design.

87.92.text: Anyway, going back to the book!

89.20.text: Once I finish the other books,

90.54.text: I am going to start this from the beginning again

92.22.text: and hopefully I will take it in a bit better.

94.70.text: But I am excited to have this in my hands.

99.70.text: Okay the next book doesn't really count

101.20.text: but the lady at Penguin gave this to me today

104.42.text: It's a Doctor Who colouring book!

113.70.text: Colouring books are all the rave right now,

115.48.text: so to have a Doctor Who one is just, wow.

118.40.text: I'm a little bit nervous because there are angels

121.98.text: as well as throughout the book

125.12.text: My Dad and I were looking at this earlier

130.28.text: But I'm going off topic, back to the books that I'm reading.

132.90.text: OK, so time to get ranty.

136.56.text: So I am currently listening to 'Allegiant' (Veronica Roth)

138.90.text: and I'm having a really hard time.

143.44.text: It's annoying when you get attached to a book series

146.78.text: and then it goes on a completely different direction

148.34.text: to what you expected, and you just find yourself going

152.50.text: There was a point yesterday where I said

153.82.text: "Enough is enough, I am taking a break."

156.20.text: Because it's an audiobook, I can't grab hold of it

158.34.text: but had I had the book in my hands,

160.36.text: I would have thrown it out the window.

162.12.text: I'm exaggerating a little bit, but that just

166.10.text: I've got about 4 hours left on the audiobook,

168.08.text: I just need to take a break and process

171.40.text: And just, prepare myself for what's coming next.

174.54.text: Everyone is telling me that it's about

176.42.text: so I need to get some tissues.

180.94.text: Okay, the very last book is

184.70.text: And I've decided to listen to the audiobook

186.32.text: as opposed to buying it on my Kindle

187.90.text: and I think that was the best decision I could have made.

193.74.text: It's like listening to the film,

199.98.text: It just makes me laugh, out loud

201.90.text: and laughing out loud for me is so rare.

204.26.text: I'm one of those people where,

205.56.text: even if I find something funny

207.04.text: I don't necessarily show that I find it funny.

210.08.text: I just sit and look neutral.

216.92.text: maybe it's the character itself, ( maybe its Maybelline :)

218.48.text: I don't know what it is just yet.

220.56.text: but it is making me so happy.

222.38.text: I've got about 2 hours left of the audiobook,

228.16.text: Gosh, you can tell I'm getting vamped up about books.

232.76.text: I haven't been this passionate about books

235.18.text: I'm just trying to think of other books

240.86.text: So yeah, that's where I am

243.80.text: I think we can safely say

244.94.text: that I'm back to reading books.

247.88.text: Before I go, I do have a 'Goodreads' account.

250.38.text: So, if you want to follow me there,

251.88.text: then the link is in the description box as well.

254.38.text: As you can imagine, with 4 books on the go,

262.08.text: Okay, so Mr. Polar Bear and I

263.92.text: are now going to disappear to

267.70.text: And, we shall see you again another time.
